title: Rafael Delgado-Ruiz, DDs, MSc, PhD
description: Rafael Delgado-Ruiz, DDS, MSc, PhD Associate Professor Department of Prosthodontics and Digital Technology
cleaned_text: Rafael Delgado-Ruiz, DDS, MSc, PhD Associate Professor Department of Prosthodontics and Digital Technology Fellowship/Advanced Training: 1996 DDs., National University of Colombia, Bogotá, Colombia 1998 MSc., Complutense University, Madrid, Spain, Specialist in Buco-Dental Preventive Programs at Public and Individual Level 2000 MSc., Complutense University, Madrid, Spain, Oral Medicine 2007 Fellowship, Granada University, Granada, Spain, Animal Experimentation and Animal Research, 2008 Postgraduate, Valencia, Spain, Prosthodontics 2009 PhD., Murcia University, Murcia, Spain Doctor of Philosophy, Summa Cum Laude 2011 MSc., Murcia University, Murcia, Spain, Implant Dentistry Reviewer of the following Journals: 1. Clinical Implant Dentistry and Related Research 2. Clinical Oral Implants Research 3. Journal of biomedical Materials Research Part A 4. Journal of biomedical Materials Research Part B 5. International Journal of Dental Science 6. Journal of Photonics and Lasers in Medicine 7. International Journal of Image Processing 8. International Journal of Cases Report Research Interests: Dental Implants (surfaces, designs, immediate loading, crestal-subcrestal position, zirconia dental implants), Implant Prosthodontics, Bone Substitutes, Synthesis and Evaluation, Bone Regeneration, Thermograph Analysis of Drilling processes (Bone, teeth and materials), Optical Scanners Language(s) spoken: English and Spanish Publications: JL, Romanos GE. size defects for bone regeneration experiments in rabbit calvariae.
